languages.text: К сожалению, мало кто из бойцов планетарного гарнизона был достаточно компетентен, чтобы можно было без последствий вручить им в руки могущие инструменты разрушения. Многочисленные инциденты, связанные с детонацией баков {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометия{/g}, затрудняли и замедляли уничтожение островных лесов.

traits.locale_text: К сожалению, мало кто из бойцов планетарной обороны был достаточно компетентен, чтобы можно было без последствий вручить им в руки могущие инструменты разрушения. Многочисленные инциденты, связанные с детонацией баков прометиума, затрудняли и замедляли уничтожение островных лесов.

languages.text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.
languages.original_text: К сожалению, мало кто из бойцов планетарного гарнизона был достаточно компетентен, чтобы можно было без последствий вручить им в руки могущие инструменты разрушения. Многочисленные инциденты, связанные с детонацией баков {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометия{/g}, затрудняли и замедляли уничтожение островных лесов.

traits.locale_text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary defense soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of promethium tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

Unfortunately, few of the planetary defense soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of promethium tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

Unfortunately, few of the planetary defense soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of promethium tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

languages.text: 残念ながら、反動を受けることなく強力な破壊兵器を扱えるほど有能な惑星警備隊の兵士は、ほとんどいなかった。大抵の場合{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}タンクの燃焼と関係したため、森に火を放つ作戦は遅延と困難を伴った。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

traits.locale_text: 残念ながら、反動を受けることなく強力な破壊兵器を扱えるほど有能な惑星警備隊の兵士は、ほとんどいなかった。大抵の場合{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}タンクの燃焼と関係したため、森に火を放つ作戦は遅延と困難を伴った。

languages.text: 遗憾的是，行星驻军几乎没办法在不造成事故的情况下，熟练使用这些威力强大的破坏工具。火焰喷射器的{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}罐燃烧出现了各种各样的事故，焚烧森林的进度非常缓慢，整个过程相当不顺。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，行星驻军几乎没办法在不造成事故的情况下，熟练使用这些威力强大的破坏工具。火焰喷射器的{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}罐燃烧出现了各种各样的事故，焚烧森林的进度非常缓慢，整个过程相当不顺。

languages.text: Por desgracia, pocos soldados de la guarnición planetaria estaban lo bastante capacitados para manejar estos potentes ingenios de destrucción sin consecuencias adversas. Numerosos incidentes relacionados con la combustión de tanques de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} convirtieron la quema de bosques en un proceso largo y complicado.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

traits.locale_text: Por desgracia, pocos soldados de la guarnición planetaria estaban lo bastante capacitados para manejar estos potentes ingenios de destrucción sin consecuencias adversas. Numerosos incidentes relacionados con la combustión de tanques de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} convirtieron la quema de bosques en un proceso largo y complicado.

languages.text: Leider beherrschten nur wenige Soldaten der Garnison des Planeten diese mächtigen Werkzeuge der Zerstörung so gut, dass es keine negativen Konsequenzen hatte. Zahlreiche Vorfälle im Zusammenhang mit in Brand geratenen {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g}-Tanks führten dazu, dass das Niederbrennen der Wälder deutlich langsamer und schwieriger wurde.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

traits.locale_text: Leider beherrschten nur wenige Soldaten der Garnison des Planeten diese mächtigen Werkzeuge der Zerstörung so gut, dass es keine negativen Konsequenzen hatte. Zahlreiche Vorfälle im Zusammenhang mit in Brand geratenen {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g}-Tanks führten dazu, dass das Niederbrennen der Wälder deutlich langsamer und schwieriger wurde.

languages.text: Malheureusement, parmi les soldats de la garnison planétaire, peu avaient les compétences requises pour manipuler ces puissants outils de destruction sans conséquences graves. De nombreux incidents causés par l'explosion de réservoirs de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} ralentit considérablement l'incinération des forêts.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, parmi les soldats de la garnison planétaire, peu avaient les compétences requises pour manipuler ces puissants outils de destruction sans conséquences graves. De nombreux incidents causés par l'explosion de réservoirs de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} ralentit considérablement l'incinération des forêts.

languages.text: Ne yazık ki bu güçlü imha araçlarını taşıyabilecek yetkinlikteki asker sayısı, gezegen garnizonunda bir elin parmaklarını geçmiyordu. {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Prometyum{/g} tanklarının patlamasıyla ilgili birtakım hadiselerin ardından ormanların yakımı yavaşladı ve daha da zorlaştı.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, few of the planetary garrison soldiers were skilled enough to wield these powerful tools of destruction without any adverse consequences. Numerous incidents related to the combustion of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} tanks, made torching the forests a slower and more difficult process.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki bu güçlü imha araçlarını taşıyabilecek yetkinlikteki garnizon askeri sayısı, bir elin parmağını geçmiyordu. {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Prometyum{/g} tanklarının patlamasıyla ilgili birtakım hadiselerin ardından ormanların yakımı yavaşladı ve daha da zorlaştı.
